item.title: [Python] [Beginner] Learn Python basic grammar in 5 hours for free!
item.description: ## Introduction This article is available from AI Academy’s Python Syntax quick learningandPythonprogrammingintroduction This is a partial modification based on the content. You can learn the basics of Python basic grammar by reading this article. If you have finished learning Python, please use AI Academy,whereyoucanlearnAIandmachinelearningforfree(onlysomecontentsarechargedbutbasiccontentsarealmostfree). .. *For short-term AI boot camps for individuals, click here (https://aiacademy.jp/bootcamp/) Why Python? **AI Academyhandleslearningcontentscenteredontheartificialintelligence(AI) field, and Python handles machine learning and deep learning easily in the artificial intelligence field.
